title: Process a Parental Leave Request
description: An employee is requesting to take parental leave provided by company policy.

tasks.description: Receive the employee's request for parental leave and the expected start date.
Verify the employee's eligibility for parental leave based on tenure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist confirms the employee meets the 1-year service requirement.

tasks.description: Approve the leave in the HRIS and provide the employee with information on how their pay and benefits will be handled during the leave.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist processes the leave and clearly communicates all relevant details to the employee.
